definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
lit. a brick as a door knocker (idiom); fig. a temporary expedient/to use sb as a stepping stone to fortune
lit. throw out a brick and get jade thrown back (idiom)/fig. to attract others' interest or suggestions by putting forward one's own modest ideas to get the ball rolling
lit. contribute bricks and tiles for a building (idiom)/fig. to do one's bit to help
lit. a brick thrown to prompt others to produce a jade (idiom)/fig. a modest suggestion intended to prompt others to come forward with better ideas
to get the ball rolling (abbr. for 拋磚引玉|抛砖引玉[pao1 zhuan1 yin3 yu4])

sentences.english: That is it. So you want high temperature bricks, what are you going to make them out of?
sentences.chinese: 这就是它，因此你想要高温砖，你打算怎么做它？

sentences.english: Bright dark cherry red colour with brick- red hints.
sentences.chinese: 略带砖红色的明亮深樱桃红。

sentences.english: In this paper, a method for calculating seismic vulnerability matrix of brick masonry structure is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种计算砖砌体结构地震易损性矩阵的方法。

sentences.english: It was only just a dream.
sentences.chinese: 这张砖的每一首都很有爱。

sentences.english: Now many countries are developing the production technique of magnesia-carbon brick.
sentences.chinese: 各国都在大力开发镁碳砖生产技术。

sentences.english: The oven is made of bricks and the meat is roasted over it. It is called BBQ in short.
sentences.chinese: 炉子是砖砌的，可在炉子上烤肉，简称BBQ。

sentences.english: Can you load all these bricks alone?
sentences.chinese: 你一个人能装完所有的砖吗？

sentences.english: A-1L-AJ bricks on outlet are more than two times of imported Mg-Cr bricks in service life.
sentences.chinese: AJ用在闪速炉放出口比进口镁铬砖高出一倍还多。
壕沟被用砖覆盖起来了。

sentences.english: He bricked up the hole in the wall.
Her feet firmly planted on the tepid rough brick of the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她一双脚稳固地立在微温而粗糙的砖地上。

sentences.english: His wicked trick is to get the kids to kick bricks and lick the cricket ticket.
sentences.chinese: 他的缺德恶作剧是让孩子们踢砖和舔板球门。

sentences.english: Bricks are baked in a kiln.
A car made of bricks is displayed on street in Jiangyin, a city of east China's Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 江苏省江阴街上，展示了一辆砖砌宝马车。

sentences.english: All the windows were bricked up.

definition: to build by laying bricks or stones
to build a structure out of layered bricks or stones
BRIC/BRICS economic bloc (Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa)
